ResearchProjectDef.label: factory basics
ResearchProjectDef.description: Gain a basic fundamental understanding of factory utilization and unlock factory hoppers and terrain capable of supporting heavy machinery.

rulesStrings.li: subject->industrial efficiency
subject_story->pioneered the first integrated production lines
subject_story->transformed a small workshop into a cornerstone of the industrial revolution
subject_story->saw beyond the chaos of factory floors to the beauty of synchronized machinery
subject_gerund->laying the groundwork for modern manufacturing

ResearchProjectDef.label: electronics fabrication factory
ResearchProjectDef.description: Research a series of machines that grant the ability to automatically harness small amounts of steel from loose rock chunks and forge them into both simple mechanical components and higher tech electronic components.

rulesStrings.li: subject->automated component fabrication
subject_story->unveiled the potential of autonomous machines in electronics production
subject_story->bridged the gap between raw materials and advanced technology
subject_story->revolutionized the production of high-tech components, making them accessible to all
subject_gerund->streamlining the creation of electronics

ResearchProjectDef.label: masonry and metallics factory
ResearchProjectDef.description: Research a series of machines that grant the ability to automatically mine surface-level rock chunks as well as process them into bricks and further refine them into an advanced material indistinguishable from plasteel.

rulesStrings.li: subject->advanced materials processing
subject_story->devised a method to extract maximum value from common stone
subject_story->transformed ordinary rocks into the backbone of the strongest structures
subject_story->found a way to mimic the properties of rare materials through ingenuity and pressure
subject_gerund->redefining material science

ResearchProjectDef.label: munitions and armaments factory
ResearchProjectDef.description: Research a series of machines that grant the ability to automatically refine and clarify chemfuel from organic matter as well as process it further into weaponry and large-scale mortar shells.

rulesStrings.li: subject->weapons manufacturing
subject_story->mastered the art of turning nature into firepower
subject_story->equipped a defenseless colony to become a formidable fortress
subject_story->created munitions that changed the tide of countless battles
subject_gerund->arming the future

ResearchProjectDef.label: wearables and textiles factory
ResearchProjectDef.description: Research a series of machines that grant the ability to automatically recycle old apparel into salvaged scrap as well as assemble new apparel from the aforementioned scraps. Additionally unlocks a machine capable of molecularly reconfiguring apparel to mimic the properties of synthread.

rulesStrings.li: subject->sustainable fashion production
subject_story->revolutionized the apparel industry by introducing closed-loop recycling
subject_story->crafted garments that combined ancient weaving techniques with modern technology
subject_story->developed a method to mimic luxury textiles, making them available to all
subject_gerund->reinventing textile manufacturing

ResearchProjectDef.label: provisions packaging factory
ResearchProjectDef.description: Research a series of machines that grant the ability to automatically and efficiently harvest animal meat trimmings, cook, and package them into a variety of survival meals, kibble, and canned goods.

rulesStrings.li: subject->efficient food processing
subject_story->turned surplus harvests into lifesaving provisions for distant colonies
subject_story->invented a zero-waste system that transformed the way food is conserved
subject_story->pioneered techniques in preserving flavors, changing the culinary world
subject_gerund->mastering the art of food preservation

ResearchProjectDef.label: medicinal compounding factory
ResearchProjectDef.description: Research a series of machines that grant the ability to automatically refine a thick glycerol extremely similar to that of neutroamine, also allows the further refining into a variety of medicines or illicit drugs.

rulesStrings.li: subject->pharmaceutical innovation
subject_story->discovered a formula that rendered common diseases powerless
subject_story->blurred the lines between traditional herbal remedies and modern medicine
subject_story->created a drug that became a cornerstone in the fight against epidemics
subject_gerund->advancing medical science

ResearchProjectDef.label: basic drone assembly
ResearchProjectDef.description: Research a machine that allows the assembly of rudimentary automated rechargeable drones capable of hauling, mining, and cleaning.

rulesStrings.li: subject->automation pioneers
subject_story->launched the era of labor-free maintenance with their first drone
subject_story->dreamed of a world where technology ensured no one had to toil
subject_story->introduced drones that became the backbone of industrial expansion
subject_gerund->ushering in the age of automation

ResearchProjectDef.label: automated defensive measures
ResearchProjectDef.description: Research the ability to weaponize automated drones for a variety of purposes including mobile turret platforms, mortars, riot control and other defensive countermeasures.

rulesStrings.li: subject->defensive technologies
subject_story->engineered drones that guarded homes and defended frontiers
subject_story->turned the tide of sieges with their automated fortresses
subject_story->pioneered the use of AI in peacekeeping and defense strategies
subject_gerund->fortifying security through innovation

ResearchProjectDef.label: mechanoid structures
ResearchProjectDef.description: Research the ability to utilize mechanoid tech for different kind of structures, at a high cost.

rulesStrings.li: subject->mechanoid architecture
subject_story->built the first structures that could repair and alter themselves
subject_story->combined alien technologies to create living buildings
subject_story->envisioned cities that could adapt to their inhabitants' needs
subject_gerund->melding construction with alien tech

ResearchProjectDef.label: advanced drone assembly
ResearchProjectDef.description: Research more advanced drones, capable of analyzing and processing complex information.

rulesStrings.li: subject->cognitive machine evolution
subject_story->developed drones capable of independent thought and problem-solving
subject_story->overcame the barriers between artificial intelligence and true consciousness
subject_story->crafted drones that could learn, adapt, and innovate on their own
subject_gerund->breaching the final frontier of AI
